org.apache.flex.compiler.mxml

Interface IStateGroupDefinition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IStateDefinitionBase>, IDefinition, IStateDefinitionBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StateGroupDefinition

    public interface IStateGroupDefinition
extends IStateDefinitionBase
    Represents a state group defined with an MXML 4 document

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getIncludedStates()
      Returns an array of String objects that represent the names found in this IStateGroup

      Determines if the given state is contained within the state group

      Returns an array of IStateDefinition objects that are found in this IStateGroup
